phrases: Inside of me... you have always been crying.
I want to wipe your tears away is what I think.
I do not know what your soft, warm face will look like after the tears are wiped away.
Argh, it did not come out the way I wanted!
I really want to draw a more gentle smile...
It seems that there were not enough people to do this work.
You are not going to eat?
Once I am done with this.
What am I doing trying to look cool?!
Looks like he is still at work.
If she does not help me finish it, I will not have time to take care of the dishes.
Well, you should not be saying that.
After all, she is helping you with chores.
So you are also on her side.
That is not how it is.
I do not want to hear it.
Only if we could save up your tears,
And then, make a necklace out of them...
We could hang it on the tree.
The tree of tears is shining...
Is that all you can do?
Just who came up with pull-ups?
You are already a lap behind me.
Where did all that energy come from?
Well, we have different ways of working out.
You look just like an old man
with your eyes focusing right at the girls' white legs.
She is tripped over your eyesight, which was focused on her legs.
What the hell is wrong with you?
She really seems like a top-student, you know.
That really has the feeling of being a top-student, you know.
Well even so, she is not all that proud of herself.
Now are not you an idiot?
I would take advantage of living with her, and peek at her changing.
I will pass that to Ai-chan.
Wait a minute...At least wait for me...
Do not look at me without permission.
Is there something else you want?!
So you were picking food for the chickens?
This food came from the sky.
This child wants to fly into the sky.
But he is locked in such a place.
So I got food for him from the highest places.
A chicken that wants to fly into the sky?
Are you not letting that one eat?
That is because that one does not want to fly.
How do you know these things?
And you are the one on that side.
You do not want to fly.
What do you know about someone like me, who has only talked to you once?
Well, I think I know what is going on.
It seems like you might be able to fly.
Since your head seems quite empty.
should be light, but empty sounds better I thinkSeems to me you are just stupid or something.
Oh, that Isurugi Noe from Class A, huh?
There are some scary rumors about her.
For example, it is said that she exchanges e-mails with a person who lives underground
Or that she can summon a pink elephant when she whistles.
wtf @ this line, tiger = tora, he says zou (elephant)
If Isurugi Noe calls out her Secret special disaster move, you are no match for her!
Isurugi Noe's Cursing Technique is real divination.
Hisatsu ougi higeki wo yobu wo machi nai
After she said I hope it shrinks to someone, it turns out it really did!
Curse that of yours to shrink to someone...
Do you need the Chief for something?
After someone dad knew died last year,
Their daughter, Hiromi, was adopted by my family.
We have been in the same class since elementary school.
And because her smiling face interested me.
If you keep sighing, you will be hit with bad luck.
Not like I am going to do the dance because I want to.
Everyone has high expectations of you!
I am really bad at the Mugiya dance.
How could I be the main star?
TL Note: The Mugiya dance is a traditional dance performed in the Toyama prefecture.
I really do not want to be born in that kind of a family...
I think you are thinking too much about everything.
You are making it seem like you are so much better, even though you are just one year older.
One year is a long time,
A crawling baby could even learn to walk in that time.
Before you say that, remove that beer case under your feet.
I was worried about you, you know!
Oh, Shinichirou, so you were here!
Miyokichi, you are already done with the chores at home?
What is with you, just give it to me.
I feel bad about bothering you two.
I am the one that saw you...
I should be the one apologizing!
She did not react the way Nobuse said...
But that should be the natural reaction, right?
My family is taking care of Hiromi.
She has always tried to keep from standing out.
It says that it is a publisher from Tokyo.
How can you hide something like this from your parents?!
So you opened it without permission.
It is just that I think it is inappropriate to open it without permission.
It has nothing to do with the Nakagami Family.
Good boy, good boy, good boy!
Let us go show it to Raigou-maru!
It is the name of that chicken.
What about the one that cannot fly?
So you already named them, huh...
Cursing someone is a double-edged sword.
To have made this happen to you...
Shinichirou has a cockroach under his shoeJ
Shinichirou has a cockroach under his shoeJ
I need to reclaim my tears.
You are seriously trying to replace Raigou-maru with me?
